ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Potters] Digest Number 78
ygData.msgSnippet: Well (as a Guide) I Saw all the /bugs or /feedbacks show up in the Que & we had to check them out & write up a Report for them, but they were on the bottom of
ygData.messageBody:
Well (as a Guide) I Saw all the /bugs or /feedbacks show up in the Que & we
had to check them out & write up a Report for them, but they were on the
bottom of the list of things to do. I was also told they it only works 20%
of the time any way


Battlestaff Fuzzietoe, Mithaniel Marr
42nd Ranked Druid of Karana
Master Brewer, Master Baker, Master Potter, Master Fletcher

-----Original Message-----
From: libertn2@... [mailto:libertn2@...]
Sent: Saturday, March 11, 2000 8:45 PM
To: EQ_Potters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Potters] Digest Number 78


From: libertn2@...

Actually, Abashi stated (paraphrased and reposted to the Guide board) that
they receive about 10,000 /feedback and /bug reports a day. They do not go
to Guides. I don't know about GM's but I doubt it. I was told (as a Guide)
that they went directly to Verant. Due to the volume of reports, they were
simply ignored.
